en.title: IOL 2025 Mobile App
en.description: A comprehensive mobile application designed for the International Linguistics Olympiad 2025, featuring interactive learning tools and competition resources.

zh.title: IOL 2025 手機應用程式
zh.description: 為2025年國際語言學奧林匹亞設計的綜合性手機應用程式，具備互動學習工具和競賽資源。

en.title: Machine Learning Adaptive System
en.description: Advanced ML pipeline using TensorFlow and PyTorch for personalized learning. Features real-time difficulty adjustment, cognitive load assessment, and automated problem generation through NLP. Published research shows 34% improvement in learning efficiency.

zh.title: 機器學習適應性系統
zh.description: 使用 TensorFlow 和 PyTorch 的先進機器學習管道用於個人化學習。具備即時難度調整、認知負荷評估和透過自然語言處理的自動題目生成功能。已發表研究顯示學習效率提升34%。

en.title: Computational Linguistics Toolkit
en.description: Integrated phonetic analysis algorithms, morphological parsers, and syntactic tree generators. Implements state-of-the-art NLP models for cross-linguistic pattern recognition with IPA transcription and automatic phoneme segmentation. Research contributions accepted at ACL 2024.

zh.title: 計算語言學工具包
zh.description: 整合語音分析演算法、詞法解析器和句法樹生成器。實現最先進的自然語言處理模型用於跨語言模式識別，具備國際音標轉錄和自動音素分割。研究貢獻被 ACL 2024 接受。

en.title: Cross-Platform Architecture
en.description: Built with React Native 0.72, TypeScript, and Redux Toolkit. Backend services in Node.js with GraphQL API and PostgreSQL database. CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions with automated testing. Supports real-time collaboration and offline functionality with optimized SQLite performance.

zh.title: 跨平台架構
zh.description: 使用 React Native 0.72、TypeScript 和 Redux Toolkit 構建。後端服務使用 Node.js 配備 GraphQL API 和 PostgreSQL 資料庫。使用 GitHub Actions 的 CI/CD 管道進行自動化測試。支援即時協作和離線功能，並具備優化的 SQLite 性能。

en.title: Educational Impact Research
en.description: Deployed across 15+ countries with 10,000+ active users. Controlled studies demonstrate significant improvements in linguistics learning outcomes. Performance benchmarks: <2s cold start time, 60fps UI rendering. All core libraries and educational modules open-sourced under MIT license.

zh.title: 教育影響研究
zh.description: 在15個以上國家部署，擁有10,000以上活躍用戶。對照研究證明語言學學習成果顯著改善。性能基準：冷啟動時間 <2秒，UI 渲染 60fps。所有核心函式庫和教育模組在 MIT 許可證下開源。

en.title: Open Source Repository
en.description: Complete source code available on GitHub with comprehensive documentation, API references, and contribution guidelines. Features automated testing, continuous integration, and detailed technical architecture documentation.

zh.title: 開源程式碼庫
zh.description: GitHub 上提供完整原始碼，包含綜合文件、API 參考和貢獻指南。具備自動化測試、持續整合和詳細的技術架構文件。

en.title: Research Publications
en.description: Published research papers on computational linguistics applications, machine learning in education, and mobile app architecture. Available through ACL Anthology, IEEE Xplore, and arXiv preprint server.

zh.title: 研究發表
zh.description: 已發表關於計算語言學應用、教育機器學習和移動應用程式架構的研究論文。可透過 ACL Anthology、IEEE Xplore 和 arXiv 預印本伺服器取得。

en.title: Technical Documentation
en.description: Comprehensive technical documentation including API references, development guides, architectural decisions, and deployment instructions. Features interactive examples and code snippets for developers and researchers.

zh.title: 技術文件
zh.description: 綜合技術文件包含 API 參考、開發指南、架構決策和部署說明。為開發者和研究人員提供互動式範例和程式碼片段。
